Text: Richard O'Connor:  He was the field commander for Operation "Compass", in which his forces destroyed a much larger Italian army – a victory which nearly drove the Axis from Africa, and in turn, led Adolf Hitler to send the German Africa Corps under Erwin Rommel to try to reverse the situation.

<Text: Richard O'Connor:  He eventually escaped after the fall of Mussolini in the autumn of 1943.>
